name: Detail data about posts
description:
*** Please remind: This preset was developed for the Facebook Graph API Version v4.0. Be aware that APIs are changing constantly, so that you may have to change things by hand.***

*** Due to the changes in the Facebook API, fetching detail data as reactions (e.g. likes) only works limited: You may have to remove the fields for the likes.*** 


Get detailed data about a post. Use the fields-parameter to provide a list of the fields you would like to have back from the API. You can use this preset to get fields you forgot in the first time :)

Before you can use this preset, you have to fetch the posts or add Facebook IDs of some posts. See the preset "Get Facebook posts". 

If you want to change or add more fields see https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v4.0/post for all available fields.

Notice: If you add more fields, also add them in the column setup to make the data visible in the nodes view.
